text: khrang meux xi sa rusuk wa mi kar ptiseth sraththa keid khun nı hmu phwk khea cung di klaw wa khır bang ca pen phu chwyhelux chan pi su xallxhˌ brrda sawk phu brisuththicı klaw wa phwk rea khux phu chwy he lux xallxhˌ phwk rea sraththa tx xallxhˌ læw læa than cng pen phyan dwywa thæcring phwk rea nan khux phu nxm tam
